item.title: Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods coming to console this summer in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/elminage-original-priestess-of-darkness-and-the-ring-of-the-gods-coming-to-console-this-summer-in-japan

Further details to be announced in late March.

Mebius will release a console version of Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods this summer in Japan as the first in a series of console ports of the Elminage dungeon RPG series, the publisher announced.

Development of the release will be handled by OperaHouse. Further information, including screenshots and a release date, will be announced in late March.

Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods is currently available for PC via Steam, where it launched in 2017. It originally released for PlayStation 2 in 2008, and has also been ported to DS, PSP, and 3DS.
